entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
